origin: 謎の少年を連れ去られ、困惑する[플레이어]一行。少年を帝国から助け出すため、一行は帝国の戦艦が停泊しているであろう港へと急ぐ。

name: 이오
origin:
ど、どーしよー！？
あたし達、どうすればいいわけ！？

謎の少年を連れ去られ、
[플레이어]一行を取り巻く状況は
混迷を極めていた。

name: 오이겐
origin:
油断してたぜ……
まさか無関係の奴を、
さらって行くたぁな……

name: 카타리나
origin:
卑劣極まりないが、
私達には効果的な作戦だ……

name: 카타리나
origin:
無関係だからこそ、
巻き込んでしまった以上、
絶対に見捨てるわけにはいかないからな。

name: 라캄
origin:
グランサイファーが
このままじゃ島を出られないってのも
気になるぜ。

name: 라캄
origin:
それに、
あいつが言っていた、
約束っつーのもな……

name: 비
origin:
となりゃあ、
帝国からあいつを、
取り戻すっきゃねーな！

name: 루리아
origin:
あの人、私についても
何か知ってるみたいだったし……
早く助けに行きましょう！

name: 라캄
origin:
連中の居場所は……
おそらく例の戦艦か。
港へ急ぐぞ！ [플레이어]！
帝国の者達が居るということは、オルキスもこの島に来ているのかもしれない、と期待するルリア。しかし、先ほど謎の少年を連れ去った場に黒騎士の姿がなかったことに疑念を抱く。

name: 루리아
origin: はぁ……

name: 카타리나
origin:
どうした、ルリア？
緊張しているのか？

name: 루리아
origin:
うん……帝国の人が来てるってことは、
もしかしたら、
オルキスちゃんも……

name: 카타리나
origin:
それは……
確かにその可能性もあり得るな。

name: 카타리나
origin:
しかし、先ほどの場に、
黒騎士が居なかったことが
気にかかる……

name: 카타리나
origin:
それに、どうして今頃になって、
エルステ帝国の宰相が、
わざわざ私達の前に……

name: 루리아
origin:
んん……
悩んでたってしょうがないよね。
行ってみれば、きっとわかる……

name: 카타리나
origin:
ふっ……それもそうだな。
ともかくいまは、先へ進もう！
自身に「久しぶり」と語りかけた少年をなんとか思い出そうとするラカム。しかし、思い出は靄がかかったように淡く、どうにも彼の存在を思い出すことが出来ない。

name: 라캄
origin:
ちっ……ダメだな、
やっぱり思い出せねぇ……

name: 이오
origin:
思い出せないって……
あの男の子のこと？

name: 라캄
origin:
ああ……
あいつ、久しぶりって言ってたろ？
だから俺の知り合いだと思うんだが……

name: 오이겐
origin:
ラカムの知り合いでも
ガロンゾで知り合ったってんなら、
オレが覚えてても不思議じゃねぇが……

name: 오이겐
origin:
しっかし、オレも記憶にねぇなぁ……
あんな風変りなガキ、
一度見たら忘れそうにねぇんだが……

name: 라캄
origin:
こうなりゃ、
どういう知り合いだったか
直接本人に聞くしかねぇよな……

name: 이오
origin:
それ……もの凄く気まずいわよ。
あの子とそういう話するなら、
あたしの居ないとこでやってね？

name: 라캄
origin:
あー、くそ！
戦艦に着く前に、
絶対に思い出してやらぁ！
謎の少年のことを思い出すことが出来ないラカム。しかし、ラカムには引っかかっているものがあり、少年が口にした約束という言葉から、少しずつ思い出を甦らせていく。

name: 라캄
origin:
けど、確かに何かが
引っかかってるんだよな……

name: 라캄
origin:
思い出せねぇ……
けど、何かを忘れてる、
ってことは覚えてんだ……

name: 라캄
origin:
この島で大切な何かを……
大切な約束を……あいつと？

name: 마물
origin: グオオオォォッ！！

name: 라캄
origin:
ったく……
本当に間の悪い連中だな……

name: 라캄
origin:
生憎、いまはお前らに、
構ってる余裕はねぇんだ……
蹴散らすぞ！ [플레이어]！
道中、少年の存在について疑問を抱くビィ。幼い頃のラカムと知り合いだったという少年が、どうしていまも少年の姿なのか、一行の中で答えが出ることはなかった。

name: 비
origin:
ん……？
な、なぁなぁ、
ちょいとおかしくねぇか？

name: 라캄
origin: ん？ 何がだよ？

name: 비
origin:
だってよぅ、
ラカムがこの島に来たのは
ずいぶん小っちぇ頃だったんだろ？

name: 비
origin:
ってことは、
その頃のラカムの知り合いは、
ラカムと変わらない歳か年上だろ？

name: 비
origin:
けどあいつ……
どう見たって、せいぜい
イオくらいの歳にしか見えなかったぜ？

name: 카타리나
origin:
い、言われてみればそうだな……
どうしてこんな単純なことに
いままで気付かなかったのか……

name: 루리아
origin:
で、でもあの人、
イオちゃんと同じくらいの歳とは
思えなかったです……

name: 루리아
origin:
あの落ち着いた雰囲気とか、
話し方とか……

name: 이오
origin:
ちょっと、
それ、どういう意味かしら……？

name: 루리아
origin:
あ、えと……
す、すごく大人びてたなー
って意味です！

name: 루리아
origin:
あの、え～っと！
イオちゃんが
子供っぽいなんて思ってないですよ！

name: 이오
origin:
もう！
口で言っちゃってるじゃない！

name: 오이겐
origin:
それも助け出して本人に
聞くしかねぇだろうな……

name: 오이겐
origin:
約束を果たさなきゃ、
グランサイファーが飛び立てねぇ、
ってことも含めて……な。
停泊する帝国の戦艦を見つける[플레이어]一行。中へと忍び込むべく、周囲を見張る警備兵達の隙をついて進む。

name: 라캄
origin:
あれが帝国の戦艦だな……
あの中か……

name: 이오
origin: 案外あっさり見つかったわね。

name: 오이겐
origin: そりゃあ小せぇ島だからな。

name: 오이겐
origin:
立ち寄る騎空艇こそ多いが、
島自体は他に比べりゃ、
小せぇもんさ。

name: 카타리나
origin:
当然だが、
戦艦の周りには警備兵が居るな……
まずはあれを片づけなくてはなるまい。

name: 비
origin:
よっしゃ！
こうなりゃ先手必勝だぜ！
相手の隙をついてやれ！
帝国の戦艦へと忍び込んだ[플레이어]一行。ルリアの言う怪しい気配をたどって進むと、因縁の相手であるポンメルン大尉が一行を待ち構えていた。

name: 라캄
origin:
戦艦に乗り込んだはいいが……
あいつはいったい、
どこに居るんだ？

name: 루리아
origin:
んと……
なんだか怪しい気配が、
向こうのほうから……

name: 비
origin: あ、怪しい気配って……

name: 라캄
origin:
だが、他に手がかりもねぇ……
ともかく行ってみるぞ！

name: 폼메른
origin:
クッククク……
やっぱり、
来やがったですネェ……

おやおや、これはすごいねぇ。
破竹の勢いというやつだ。

name: 오이겐
origin:
どうやらここで
当たりだったみてぇだなぁ、おい。

name: 폼메른
origin:
宰相閣下から預かった以上、
そう簡単に、
渡すわけにはいきませんからネェ……

name: 폼메른
origin:
まずは我らがエルステ帝国が誇る、
精兵達の相手をしてもらいますよォ！
ポンメルン率いる帝国兵達を蹴散らす[플레이어]一行。追い詰められたポンメルンは魔晶によって自らの姿を変貌させ、[플레이어]一行へと襲い掛かってくる。

name: 비
origin:
へへっ！
あの程度の兵隊が、
いまさら相手になるかってんだ！

name: 폼메른
origin:
くっ……
宰相閣下を失望させるわけには
いきませんからネェ……

name: 폼메른
origin:
貴様らは私自ら、
返り討ちにしてあげますよォォッ！！

name: 폼메른
origin:
いまッ！ ここでッ！！
カタリナ中尉への復讐も、
果たさせてもらいますよォォォッ！！

name: 라캄
origin:
けっ……
一度、アウギュステで目にしてる以上、
同じネタじゃあ、驚かねぇぜ！

name: 카타리나
origin:
油断は出来ないぞ。
魔晶の力は、
計り知れないものがあるからな……

name: 오이겐
origin:
はん……
的がデカくなったってぇだけの話だぜ。

name: 오이겐
origin:
こんなに狙いやすい獲物もねぇ！
仕留めるぞ！ [플레이어]！

name: 폼메른
origin:
ぬぅぅ……！
魔晶の出力をあげたものの
身体がついてこないとは……

name: 카타리나
origin:
待て！ ポンメルン！
ここで因縁は、
終わらせてもらうぞ！

name: 폼메른
origin: 馬鹿おっしゃイィィイィ！！

name: 카타리나
origin:
なにっ！？
剣が届かないだと……！
ポンメルンを倒し謎の少年を救い出す[플레이어]一行。ラカムが少年に全ての疑問を投げかけると、少年はそれに答えるように、自らが艇造りの星晶獣であり、グランサイファーの製作者であることを明かすのだった。

name: 폼메른
origin:
こんなところで死ぬワケにはァァ！
いかないんですよォォォォッ！！

name: 폼메른
origin:
さらばですネェ逆賊共ォォォ！
次は命は無いと思いなさいィィ！！

ポンメルンを退けた一行は、
無事、謎の少年を助け出した。

ありがとう、ラカム、[플레이어]。
君達なら、
必ず助けに来てくれると思っていたよ。

name: 라캄
origin: ああ、いや……

name: 라캄
origin:
なぁ……
お前は俺とは、
どういう知り合いなんだ？

name: 라캄
origin:
この島……ガロンゾで、
俺達は会ったことがあるのか？

そうだね……
ガロンゾは僕達の出会いの地であり、
同時に約束の地だ。

name: 라캄
origin:
なぁ……
けど、そうするとおかしいんだよ。

name: 라캄
origin:
俺がガロンゾに来たのは
俺がまだ小せぇガキの頃だ。

name: 라캄
origin:
その頃、
いまどう見てもガキのお前は、
まだ生まれてもいねぇんじゃねぇか？

ふふ……
そんなことはないよ、ラカム。

確かに君が大人になるまで……
それはとても長い年月だね。

けど、悠久を超える僕達星晶獣にとって、
それくらいの歳月は、
あっという間なのさ。

もちろん……それでも僕は
約束が果たされる日を、
心待ちにしていたんだけどね。

name: 카타리나
origin:
なっ……
き、君はいま、なんと……？

name: 오이겐
origin:
オレの聞き間違いじゃなきゃあ、
いま、星晶獣って……

そうか……
改めての自己紹介が必要だったね。

name: ノア
origin:
僕はノア。
艇造りを司る星晶獣であり……
騎空艇グランサイファーの製作者だ。

少年の告げる正体に、
言葉を失う[플레이어]一行。

しかし、驚く一行のすぐ後ろには、
軍靴の音が
高らかに迫りつつあるのだった。
[플레이어] and the crew discuss why the empire took custody of the mysterious boy.

name: Io
origin: Wh-what do we do now!
[플레이어] and the crew find themselves dumfounded after the mysterious boy is captured.

name: Eugen
origin: We were careless... And somebody with no connection to us paid the price for it...

name: Katalina
origin: It was a despicable strategy. But a highly effective one.

name: Katalina
origin: Even if he's not part of our crew, we can't just abandon him after getting him into this mess.

name: Rackam
origin: Don't forget he said somethin' about the Grandcypher being stuck on the island.

name: Rackam
origin: And not to mention whatever he was talkin' about when he referred to a promise...

name: Vyrn
origin: What are we waitin' for then! Let's go get him back!

name: Lyria
origin: Yes, we need to hurry and go rescue him! After all, he seemed like he knew something about me too.

name: Rackam
origin: Hmm... They probably took him back to their battleship. C'mon, [플레이어]! To the port!
Lyria wonders if she'll be able to see Orchis again.

name: Lyria
origin: Sigh...

name: Katalina
origin: What's wrong, Lyria? Feeling anxious?

name: Lyria
origin: It's just... if the empire's here, then that means maybe Orchis is here too...

name: Katalina
origin: Well that certainly is possible.

name: Katalina
origin: But it is strange that the Black Knight wasn't with the other imperial officers earlier...

name: Katalina
origin: And why would the prime minister of the Erste Empire herself suddenly appear before us?

name: Lyria
origin: That worries me too. We'll just have to go and find out.

name: Katalina
origin: Sigh. You're right. We've got no choice but to move forward for now.
Rackam tries to remember who the mysterious boy could be.

name: Rackam
origin: Tch... Dammit, I just can't remember...

name: Io
origin: Can't remember? You mean who that boy was?

name: Rackam
origin: Aye... He said, it's been a long time. That means I met him in the past, right?

name: Eugen
origin: Well if you met him in Golonzo, then I should be able to remember him too...

name: Eugen
origin: But alas, no memory of him at all. And no one would forget a weird kid like that.

name: Rackam
origin: That leaves us no choice. Guess we'll have to ask him face to face.

name: Io
origin: Geez, this sounds like it's gonna be super awkward. Make sure you talk to him when I'm not there, okay?

name: Rackam
origin: Ah dammit! Gotta remember who he is before we get to the battleship!
Rackam's memories slowly start to return.

name: Rackam
origin: Yeah... I think we must've had some kinda connection...

name: Rackam
origin: Even if I can't remember what it was, at least I know that I've forgotten something.

name: Rackam
origin: Something important... Was it a promise? With him?

name: Monster
origin: Groar!

name: Rackam
origin: For crying out—you jerks always show up at the wrong time.

name: Rackam
origin: We don't have time to play around. Let's make this quick, [플레이어]!
Vyrn wonders why Rackam's acquaintance looks so young.

name: Vyrn
origin: Hey, doesn't anyone else think it's weird?

name: Rackam
origin: Huh? What?

name: Vyrn
origin: That, you know, Rackam was really little when he came to this island.

name: Vyrn
origin: So if he met somebody back then, wouldn't they have been around his age?

name: Vyrn
origin: But that guy, well, doesn't he look like he's right around the same age as Io?

name: Katalina
origin: Now that you mention it, yes. I wonder why I hadn't noticed something so obvious.

name: Lyria
origin: But I don't think he's Io's age.

name: Lyria
origin: He's really calm, and he doesn't talk like a kid.

name: Io
origin: Hey now, what exactly are you getting at?

name: Lyria
origin: Um, like, I mean he's really mature!

name: Lyria
origin: B-but it's not like you're really immature or anything!

name: Io
origin: Humph! I can tell what you really mean, you know!

name: Eugen
origin: Nothin' else we can do but rescue the lad and ask him ourselves.

name: Eugen
origin: Besides, if we don't figure out what he meant by that promise, then the Grandcypher's not goin' anywhere anytime soon.
[플레이어] and the crew approach the imperial battleship.

name: Rackam
origin: There's the imperial battleship. So we're headed inside of that, huh...

name: Io
origin: It was way easier to find than you'd think.

name: Eugen
origin: Well, this is a tiny island after all.

name: Eugen
origin: Sure lots of airships are always passin' through, but compare it to any other island, and it's just a minnow.

name: Katalina
origin: There are guards around the battleship. We're going to have to do something about them first.

name: Vyrn
origin: Let's hit 'em before they see us comin'!
[플레이어] and the crew manage to board the imperial battleship, where they find Pommern waiting for them.

name: Rackam
origin: Getting on to the ship is one thing, but finding that kid is whole 'nother problem.

name: Lyria
origin: Um... I feel something strange coming from over there...

name: Vyrn
origin: A strange feeling?

name: Rackam
origin: If that's the only hint we've got, we might as well follow it. C'mon, let's check it out!

name: Pommern
origin: Hahaha... You came. Just as I suspected you would.
Ah, now here's a sight for sore eyes.

name: Eugen
origin: Looks like our mark was here after all.

name: Pommern
origin: Yes, but you won't be taking him. The prime minister herself entrusted him to me, you see.

name: Pommern
origin: First you'll have to go through my elite troops—the very pride of the Erste Empire!
After [플레이어] and the crew force Pommern into a corner, the imperial officer transforms using dark essence.

name: Vyrn
origin: Those guys were s'posed to be your elite troops?

name: Pommern
origin: I cannot disappoint the prime minister...

name: Pommern
origin: This is where I beat you at your own game, skyfarers!

name: Pommern
origin:
And Lieutenant Katalina, make no
mistake—this is where I'll exact my revenge!

name: Rackam
origin: Ugh... Didn't you say the same kinda crap back in Auguste? Didn't matter then, and it doesn't matter now!

name: Katalina
origin: Don't underestimate him. He's using dark essence, so there's no telling what he's capable of.

name: Eugen
origin: Yeah, but on the other hand, it's like our target got a lot bigger.

name: Eugen
origin: This'll be as easy as hittin' the broad side of an airship! Let's rumble, [플레이어]!
[플레이어] and the crew rescue the mysterious boy, who finally reveals his true nature.

name: Pommern
origin: I suppose my body couldn't handle the dark essence when pushed to its limits...

name: Katalina
origin: Pommern! Don't you run! This is where I put an end to all of this!

name: Pommern
origin: What sheer foolishness!

name: Katalina
origin: Argh! My blade won't pierce him!

name: Pommern
origin: I will not die here! No way!

name: Pommern
origin: Know this, treacherous insects! The next time we meet, your lives will be forfeit!
As Pommern turns tail and dashes away, the crew hurries over to the mysterious boy.
Thank you, Rackam. Oh, and [플레이어] too. I knew that you would come to rescue me.

name: Rackam
origin: Yeah, well...

name: Rackam
origin: Look, I gotta ask... How do we know each other?

name: Rackam
origin: Was it here? Did we meet here on Golonzo?
That's right. Golonzo is both where we met and where we made a promise.

name: Rackam
origin: Huh. Well, if that's the truth, isn't it odd?

name: Rackam
origin: I mean, I came to Golonzo when I was just a little kid.

name: Rackam
origin: But you're a kid now—how could we have met? You wouldn't have even been born yet.
Haha. I believe you've misunderstood the situation, Rackam.
Many moons and stars have passed while you've grown into an adult. That is certainly true.
But for us immortal primal beasts, such a span of time is nothing more than an instant.
Nonetheless, I have been awaiting the day when you would keep your promise.

name: Katalina
origin: What did you just say?

name: Eugen
origin: If these ol' ears are still workin', I coulda sworn you said you're a primal beast...
Ah, it seems I should introduce—well—reintroduce myself.

name: Noa
origin: I am Noa, a primal beast who specializes in shipmaking and the creator of the Grandcypher.
[플레이어] and the crew find themselves at a loss for words as the boy reveals his true nature.
Despite their shock, the sound of military boots stampeding through the battleship draws ever closer.
